name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Aaron JONES, Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, and BAER, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Aaron JONES, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of September, 2004, the order of the common pleas court is AFFIRMED. See Commonwealth v. Robinson, 575 Pa. 500, 837 A.2d 1157 (2003).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Stuart Brian Lev, Esq., Stephen L. 'Marley, III, Esq., Victor J. Abreu Jr., Esq. for Aaron Jones.
Hugh J. Burns, Esq., Amy Zapp, Esq., Philadelphia, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:

Sept. 21, 2004.
